meanings.sent1: The weather today is just ducky!
meanings.sent2: She had a ducky time at the party.
meanings.sent3: The ducky cupcakes were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her ducky smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The ducky sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.

meanings.sent2: Grandma always calls me her ducky.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's pet became the class ducky.
meanings.sent4: The baby's first word was 'ducky' for his favorite toy.
meanings.sent5: The ducky in the pond waddled happily among the lilies.

meanings.definition: A small floating toy in the shape of a duck
meanings.sent1: The kids played with their ducky in the bathtub.
meanings.sent2: She collects rubber duckies of all colors.
meanings.sent3: The ducky quacked happily as it floated in the pool.
meanings.sent4: The ducky bobbed along the stream, following the current.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's favorite bath time toy was her yellow ducky.
